positive_examples: This is an example of mathematical oscillator.
The mathematical oscillator demonstrated clear characteristics.
We observed mathematical oscillator in this context.
A typical case of mathematical oscillator would involve these features.
The concept of mathematical oscillator applies here.
A mathematical model describing periodic motion or vibrations in systems such as springs, circuits, or biological rhythms.
negative_examples: This is an example of mathematical pendulum, not mathematical oscillator.
This represents mathematical model in general.
The document was filed in the cabinet.
She walked to the store to buy groceries.
training_hints.disambiguation: Not to be confused with: MathematicalPendulum, or other types of MathematicalModel

definition: A mathematical system that exhibits repetitive variation around an equilibrium.
